title: You Will Do Something Badly Before You're a Badass, with Andy Frisella - MFCEO70
description: What is one of the main reasons most people never do anything significant in life? Because their egos don't allow them to be seen doing something poorly.  They never want people to see them experiencing loss or failure. According to Andy Frisella, you have to be willing to do something badly for awhile before you become good--and eventually great--at it.  That is the natural path to excellence--and success.
